name: What's your Shadow?
description:
Shadows embody our deepest and darkest emotions. 
If you try to get rid of them, they will do anything to catch up with you. 
Remember, your shadow is only a few steps away and will catch up with you faster than you think. So, what´s your shadow?
This game was done during the HTK GameJam - IceEdition 2022' as a school project



Our Team : 
Our team consisted of six creative HTK students, who worked together as a team to complete the game.
Thanks to :
Rei -> Pixelart and Animation
Krisztina -> Pixelart and Animation
Hannah -> Pixelart and Animation
Yves -> Coding 
Mike -> Audio
Louis -> Coding
